content: From here, the large main field in front of you hides several more Frozen Corpse ambushes, plus Falcon Fan-Makers who will try and stop you from reaching the New Thunderclap Temple. However, there is one last side area worth checking out.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Valley_of_Ecstasy_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Valley of Ecstasy Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Longevity Road'.
The content is as follows:
From here, the large main field in front of you hides several more Frozen Corpse ambushes, plus Falcon Fan-Makers who will try and stop you from reaching the New Thunderclap Temple. However, there is one last side area worth checking out.
